channel.title: Help plox >_>
channel.description:
Finally managed to make a server will by make just use TestScape source, But i need help when i rais a lvl it goes strength lvl 1/9 aalso it hits really fast and It doesn't let me become Admin, If theirs another source thats as easy to use and the compiler is same as Test scapes, (Other words works for me lol) Please do tell. :)
[shadow=red,left]EDIT[/shadow] Is it true you can get Pimpscape to be a normal server and not make it PVP?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 12:01:58 PM[/size][hr]anyone?:(

item.title: Help plox >_>
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

changeing rights like that wont help 1 bit in testscape, u need to find the section on admiuns mods and rights and all that crap, then add your name amoung the rest of them

Read full topic

item.title: Help plox >_>
item.dc:creator: @foolio foolio
item.description:
@foolio wrote:

ok go to your character files you will see your name in it… click on it and look for player rights = 0 then change it to player rights = 3
that will solve your admin problems… and yes download queenscape v1 source very fun and easy

Read full topic
